name: Rep Payee System
description: The Representative Payee System (RPS) is an online system used to store and process current and prior Rep Payee applications (both approved and denied). Data is stored on the Master Rep Payee File (MRPF) as applicants, beneficiaries, or recipients, and the relationship between the Rep Payee and beneficiary.  The RPS data is also useful to adjudicators in processing subsequent actions.
